member.name: T:Monads.Factor
member.summary: A standardized method of defining a multiplier.

member.name: P:Monads.Factor.Rate
member.summary: The rate of the factor. e.g. the multiplier.

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.#ctor(System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a factor from a double.
member.param: The rate of the factor.

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a factor from an int.
member.param: The rate of the factor.

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.#ctor(System.Int64)
member.summary: Creates a factor from a long.
member.param: The rate of the factor.

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.#ctor(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Creates a factor from a decimal.
member.param: The rate of the factor.

member.name: P:Monads.Factor.Zero
member.summary: A factor of zero.

member.name: P:Monads.Factor.One
member.summary: A factor of one.

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
member.param: The object to compare with the current object.
member.returns: if the specified object is equal to the current object; otherwise, .

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.Equals(Monads.Factor)
member.summary: Indicates whether the current object is equal to another object of the same type.
member.param: An object to compare with this object.
member.returns: if the current object is equal to the parameter; otherwise, .

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.CompareTo(Monads.Factor)
member.summary: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.
member.returns: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning Less than zero This instance precedes in the sort order. Zero This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as . Greater than zero This instance follows in the sort order.

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.GetHashCode
member.summary: Serves as the default hash function.
member.returns: A hash code for the current object.

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.op_LessThan(Monads.Factor,Monads.Factor)
member.summary: Compares two factors to determine if the left factor is less than the right factor.

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.op_GreaterThan(Monads.Factor,Monads.Factor)
member.summary: Compares two factors to determine if the left factor is greater than the right factor.

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.op_LessThanOrEqual(Monads.Factor,Monads.Factor)
member.summary: Compares two factors to determine if the left factor is less than or equal to the right factor.

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.op_GreaterThanOrEqual(Monads.Factor,Monads.Factor)
member.summary: Compares two factors to determine if the left factor is greater than or equal to the right factor.

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.op_Equality(Monads.Factor,Monads.Factor)
member.summary: Compares two factors to determine if the left factor is equal to the right factor.

member.name: M:Monads.Factor.op_Inequality(Monads.Factor,Monads.Factor)
member.summary: Compares two factors to determine if the left factor is not equal to the right factor.

member.name: T:Monads.Maybe`1
member.summary: A wrapper for an object that might be null.
member.typeparam: The type of object that may be contained inside the wrapper.

member.name: P:Monads.Maybe`1.Value
member.summary: The value of the maybe.
member.exception: If the maybe does not have a value.

member.name: P:Monads.Maybe`1.HasValue
member.summary: Whether or not the maybe has been created with a value.

member.name: P:Monads.Maybe`1.HasNoValue
member.summary: Whether or not the maybe has been created without a value. Inverse of .

member.summary: Creates a maybe with a value.

member.name: M:Monads.Maybe`1.Empty
member.summary: Creates a maybe without a value.

member.name: M:Monads.Maybe`1.op_Implicit(`0)~Monads.Maybe{`0}
member.summary: Allows all values to be cast as a Maybe, for example from a call to FirstOrDefault().

member.name: T:Monads.Result
member.summary: Defines a result of an operation.

member.name: P:Monads.Result.IsSuccess
member.summary: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

member.name: P:Monads.Result.IsFailure
member.summary: Indicates whether the operation was unsuccessful. Inverse of .

member.name: P:Monads.Result.Error
member.summary: A general error message about the operation in the case of an unsuccessful operation.

member.name: P:Monads.Result.ErrorMessages
member.summary: Detailed error messages about the operation, generally intended to point to specific relevant keys about the operation (such as a property name that was invalid, for example).

member.name: M:Monads.Result.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Creates a success result.

member.name: M:Monads.Result.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.String}}[])
member.summary: Constructor for failure results with an optional set of detailed error messages.
member.param: The general error message to use for the result.
Any additional, detailed error messages to include.

member.name: M:Monads.Result.Ok
member.summary: Creates a successful result.

member.name: M:Monads.Result.Fail(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.String}}[])
member.summary: Creates an unsuccessful result with the specified general error message and an optional set of detailed error messages.
member.param: The general error message to use for the result.
Any additional, detailed error messages to include.

member.name: M:Monads.Result.op_Implicit(System.Boolean)~Monads.Result
member.summary: Allows a bool to be cast as a result with a catch-all error message for false.

member.name: M:Monads.Result.Ok``1(``0)
member.summary: Creates a successful result with a value.
member.typeparam: The type of value contained in the result.
member.param: The value of the result.

member.param: The general error message to use for the result.
Any additional, detailed error messages to include.

member.name: M:Monads.Result.Ok``2(``0)
member.summary: Creates a successful result with a success value.

The type of value contained in the result on a failure.
member.param: The value of the result.

member.summary: Creates an unsuccessful result with a failure value and the specified general error message and an optional set of detailed error messages.

The type of value contained in the result on a failure.
member.param: The general error message to use for the result.
The value of the result.

member.name: T:Monads.Result`1
member.summary: Defines a result of an operation which also returns a value on success.
member.typeparam: The type of value to include on a success.

member.name: P:Monads.Result`1.Value
member.summary: The value that was returned from the operation on a success.
member.exception: If the result is a failure.

member.name: M:Monads.Result`1.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.String}}[])
member.summary: Constructor for a failure result.
member.param: The general error message to use for the result.
Any additional, detailed error messages to include.

member.name: M:Monads.Result`1.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Constructor for a success result with the specified value.
member.param: The value returned by the operation.

member.name: M:Monads.Result`1.Ok(`0)
member.summary: Creates a successful result with the provided value.
member.param: The value returned by the operation.

member.name: P:Monads.Result`2.FailureValue

member.name: P:Monads.Weighting.Denominator
member.summary: The lower portion of the weighting. The 'Y' in 'X in Y chance of Z'.

member.name: P:Monads.Weighting.Numerator
member.summary: The upper portion of the weighting. The 'X' in 'X in Y chance of Z'.

member.summary: Indicates whether the current object is equal to another object of the same type.
member.param: An object to compare with this object.
member.returns: if the current object is equal to the parameter; otherwise, .

member.name: M:Monads.Weighting.DetermineCommonDenominator(Monads.Weighting)
member.summary: Finds a common denominator with the specified . This is not guaranteed to be the lowest common denominator.

member.name: M:Monads.Weighting.DetermineCommonDenominator(System.UInt64,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Finds a common denominator between the two specified s. This is not guaranteed to be the lowest common denominator.
